timeline.bodyText: I think this is missing the ResteasyClientBuilderImpl.setProviderFactory(clientProviderFactory), similar to the MP REST Client setting
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText:
Right, which is the MP REST Client builder impl.
We need to do the same for the JAX-RS Client builder impl, which is ResteasyClientBuilderImpl.
The names are close, which makes it confusing
replies.author: kenfinnigan

timeline.message:
[Quarkus issue #12325] Remove unnecesary code from RestClientRecorder.

[#12325] Add ResteasyClientBuilderImpl.setProviderFactory(clientProviderFactory) to RestClientRecorder

[Quarkus issue #12325] Remove unnecesary code from RestClientRecorder.

[#12325] Add ResteasyClientBuilderImpl.setProviderFactory(clientProviderFactory) to RestClientRecorder
